Text:
Please be aware that this states "Bonus" which means it is the special features disc - NOT the actual movie.

Worse is the fact that the audio is horribly out of sync on this rip. I have checked it on different machines, Mac & PC with VLC and with a WD TV Live media player to verify.

Why do people upload shit like this and why do so many people share it without checking?

For them who like watching HQ videos on flat screen in HD:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5567727/Jimmy.Fallon.2010.05.14.Stones.in.Exile.720p.HDTV.X264-QCF
validating 1eyedfishstick . This indeed is a bad egg. It's not the film, just the bonus disc(as mentioned in file name) and its horribly off sync as film moves on.
the out of sync thing is easy to solve with vlc...The f/g buttond sync it,but worse is this bonus dvd cuts off before the end.Bad upload.
